dmca.title: Breach of copyright
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

 

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

 

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

 

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal
<http://www.theplanet.com/legal> .

 

Legal Response Team

THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.


________________________________

From: Asa Butcher [mailto:asa@chameleonproject.net] 
Posted At: Tuesday, September 05, 2006 7:32 AM
Posted To: Legal Response
Conversation: Breach of copyright
Subject: Breach of copyright


5 Sept, 2006
Dear Sir/Madam,

It has come to our notice that one of your customers (www.playarta.com,
www.wexico.com, www.oviwebdevelopment) has recently used the domain:
www.theovimagazine.com to host material to which he has no legal right
or jurisdiction.

The site carries articles, illustrations, cartoons and other material
that are all copyrighted and he has no permission to use. The origin of
all of this material is from a similarly named site:
www.ovimagazine.com.

According to your Terms of Service, the domain is breaching a number of
international copyright laws:

Intellectual Property Infringement Policy 

Customers may not transmit, distribute, download, copy, cache, host, or
otherwise store on a Server any information, data, material, or work
that infringes the intellectual property rights of others. The Planet
has the right to disable access to, or remove, infringing content to the
extent required under any law or regulation, including the Digital
Millennium Copyright Act of 1998.

The Planet reserves the right to suspend permanently or terminate the
Services of any Customer that repeatedly violates The Planet's
Intellectual Property Infringement Policy or any copyright law.


Please advise our magazine of the situation.

Mr Asa Butcher
-- 

We cover every issue...every day
www.ovimagazine.com
